If you want to add images, videos or sounds to your Darwin Core Archive, this is the place!  There is a 
slightly different procedure between only having occurrence data and having both events and occurrence data, 
so please choose wisely!

.. grid:: 1 2 2 2
    :gutter: 4

    .. grid-item-card::
        :link: mm_occ.html
        :class-card: sd-text-black
        :text-align: center

        .. raw:: html
            :file: ../../_static/icons/faq.svg
                
        **Occurrences**

        Multimedia for occurrences only.

    .. grid-item-card::
        :link: mm_event.html
        :class-card: sd-text-black
        :text-align: center

        .. raw:: html
            :file: ../../_static/icons/faq.svg

        **Events**

        Multimedia with events and occurrences.
